text.text: Beautiful church where we attended a wedding ceremony of our friends children..such a lovely and peaceful experience too. After the ceremony we had a buffet lunch served in the church event hall. This place has ample parking room too, although the google map directions are incorrect resulting in most people having to make an extra circuit of the complex

After the ceremony we had a buffet lunch served in the church event hall. text.text:
Love this Catholic Church with nice architecture. It gives a sense of peace and solitude. The compound is big and has a lot of carpark and buildings, first time visitors might need a little navigation. The interior and exterior of the church are simply beautiful and comfortable. There is a multi-purpose space within walkable distance from church that can be used as cafeteria for event and the size is decent to fit plenty of people.

(Photos copyright by @KAI_Picture )

text.text:
A place of refuge, peace, solace and solitude for many. Also, one of the biggest Catholic Churches in Singapore.

Equipped with a host of features for quiet prayer and contemplation, such as the Rosary Garden, Grotto of Our Lady, and the life-sized Stations of the Cross. There are 6 designated parking spaces, and even a dedicated area for motorcycles.

There are classrooms, halls, and AVA rooms available for booking, should you need them for appropriate events.

There is a canteen run by various church ministries on Sundays, and one can expect sumptuous local delights for breakfast. On other days, there is a cafe (Benedito) located at CTIS for a quiet coffee/tea moment.

The church is child and elderly friendly, with a large cry room for parents, and wheelchair accessible zones for those who have limited mobility.

Hospitality is top-notch, as the Wardens are approachable, and ready to attend to your needs.

Non-catholics are welcome, and are never turned away. Regardless if they're just visiting, or there to learn about the faith.

If you ever find yourself lost, do pay them a visit. You might find something more than just directions to where you might be headed to.

text.text:
A beautiful church! Pious environment. Mass was beautiful the service and the orderly manner in which the ushers managed the congregation was wonderful! I had a prayerful experience.
Everyone had smiles on their faces...
Also while you are there, must catch the canteen service for a quick bite ðŸ˜Š
